name: DragonFlight (itch)
description:
Español: Un projecto que hice durante mis estudios. Es un shoot-em-up horizontal muy basico, sin power ups o saves ya que es lo que pude hacer con el tiempo que tenia y porque estoy empezando a programar y no tenia los conocimientos necesarios.

Engish: This is a project I did while studying. It's a very basic horizontal shoot-em-up with no power ups or saves since I didn't have the time to program them in and I just started programing and didnt have the proper skills.
